definition: to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste

sentences.english: Shanghai i Securities News reported, to combat escaped and revoked debts has become an important task for the current banking industry.
sentences.chinese: 上證報消息，打擊逃廢債已成當前銀行業的重要任務。

sentences.english: Individual customers who attempt to evade repayment obligations for bank loans.
sentences.chinese: 惡意逃廢銀行債務的個人客戶。
